accountsToRemoveConstraint: Your seed phrase will always be able to regenerate this wallet. It is impossible to delete it.

confirmDecryptionPermissionDescription: This will give permanent access to your history and cannot be revoked.
confirmRisk: I understand the risk and wish to proceed.
NO_DECRYPT: This app cannot decrypt any record using any of your view keys.
DECRYPT_UPON_REQUEST: This app can only decrypt records with your explicit approval. You will be prompted for any decryption request.
AUTO_DECRYPT: This app can automatically decrypt any record it needs to without explicit permission only while your wallet is connected. It cannot see your ViewKey.
lockedWalletAlreadyExists: Locked wallet already exists. Importing a new one will destroy the existing.
confirmTermsError: Unable to continue without confirming Terms of Usage
revealNewSeedPhrase: Click on area below to reveal your new Seed Phrase. Then, write this phrase on a piece of paper and store in a secure location. Or you can memorize it.
doNotSharePhrase: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone! It can be used to steal all your accounts.
doSavePhrase: Copy this phrase on paper and store it in a secure location.
youWillNeedThisSeedPhrase: If you ever switch between browsers or devices, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts.

ledgerLiveBridgeGuide: To connect to Ledger, please activate the Ledger Live application on your device, open Aleo Wallet application and allow a WebSocket connection to your Leo account.

and add a new one.

counterErrorDescription:

swapDisclaimerTitle: Disclaimer. Beta version, read before using the SWAP section.
swapDisclaimerContent:
Leo wallet only provides an interface to interact with the Aleo Dexes. 

We are not responsible for: DEX issues, displayed tokens, price, exchange rates, and user trading decisions. 

Before using this Swap Section, you should review the relevant documentation to understand how the DEX(AMM) protocols work. 

Using this section is solely the user's responsibility.
verifySeedPhraseDescription: Fill in the blank fields with the words to verify your Seed Phrase backup
addressBalanceDescription: After creating an account, you‚Äôll get a unique address ‚Äî your personal identifier in the Aleo blockchain. If you would like to receive and use Aleo credits or Aleo-built tokens in Leo, you should use this address.
addressBalanceHint: The balance of your Aleo credits is displayed under the public address.
howToStartDescription1: To start using your wallet and interacting with the Aleo DApps ecosystem, the account balance must be positive. To do this, top up your address with Aleo Credits coins.
howToStartDescription2: You can use the "Buy" button and top up your Aleo Credits balance, using cryptocurrencies, debit, or credit cards.
howToStartHint: Also, you can copy your address and send coins to it from another wallet or Exchange. To copy the address, click on it on the main wallet screen or use ‚ÄúReceive‚Äù.
tokensCollectibleDescription1: Your balances of FA1.2 and FA2 tokens are displayed on the ‚ÄúTokens‚Äù tab.
tokensCollectibleDescription2: You can send, check balances, or contract addresses of any token by clicking on it in this section.
tokensCollectibleHint: Your Non-Fungible Tokens (NFT) are displayed on the ‚ÄúCollectibles‚Äù tab. Here you can also interact with your own NFTs, see their full view, ID, and contract address.
profileRpcDescription: At the top of the interface, you can see your account robo-icon. By clicking on it, you will see the parameters for interaction with accounts, the settings button, and the extension view mode.
profileRpcHint1: Next, you will see the ‚ÄúNetworks‚Äù selector, which allows you to select a node (RPC) to which your Leo extension will be connected.
profileRpcHint2: If your balance is not displayed, try changing the node.
profileRpcHint3: You can choose from a predefined list or add RPC manually by following these
browserVersionIsOutOfDate: Your browser version is out of date, we strongly recommend updating to the newest version!
congratsDescription2: Now you know about the basic and most important functions of the Leo wallet.
congratsDescription3: You can learn all features of the Leo from our ‚ÄúEducational series‚Äù on YouTube.
congratsDescription4: Also, instructions and guides are available in our knowledge base.
congratsDescription5: Join our communities in Telegram and Discord.
congratsDescription6: PS: Good luck exploring the Aleo world!
attentionDescription: Never and under any pretext share your private keys and seed phrase with third parties.
attentionListItem1: Your wallet can be targeted through a browser 0days or via other malicious extension installed;
attentionListItem2: The screen can potentially be manipulated by malicious software installed in the system;
attentionListItem3: User‚Äôs host machine can be targeted by malware to steal encrypted wallet;
attentionListItem4: Choosing weak passwords can reduce the ability of a wallet to resist adversarial brute-forcing.
attentionListTitle2: To keep your assets safe, we recommend:
attentionListItem5: Move your funds from ‚Äúhot‚Äù wallet to ‚Äúcold‚Äù as soon as possible (Leo wallet supports integration with ‚ÄúLedger Nano‚Äù devices);
attentionListItem6: Use separate browsers for web-surfing and wallet‚Äôs operating;
attentionListItem7: Use one browser‚Äôs tab at a time to make transactions;
attentionListItem8: Keep the wallet locked when it is not in usage.
takeCare: Take care of your safety in the crypto world!
deleteTokenConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this token?
ledgerLiveSettingsDescription: The new Ledger Live bridge allows you to use your Ledger in a different way.
lockUpSettingsDescription: The extension will be automatically blocked after 10 minutes of inactivity.
buyWithExolixDescription: Exchange  $number$  cryptocurrencies to Aleo Credits or USDT Aleo instantly and without registration
buyWithMoonPayDescription: Crypto just got easy. Buy Aleo Credits in minutes using Visa, Mastercard, and all major debit and credit cards.
buyWithRampDescription: Buy Aleo Credits  using Visa, Mastercard, and all major debit and credit cards. Ramp is available in 160+ countries and territories.
buyWithAliceBob: Buy Aleo Credits with Alice-Bob (UAH only)
buyWithAliceBobDescription: Fast and cost-effective exchange of UAH to Aleo Credits.
buyWithUtorgDescription: Licensed fiat-to-crypto gateway. 187+ countries, AI-powered KYC, Apple Pay, Google Pay.
topUpDescription: Leo integrated third-party solutions to buy  $gasTokenName1$  with crypto or a Debit/Credit card. Choose a provider, follow guides, get  $gasTokenName2$  on your account.
overdueTransactionMessage:
Please, create a new exchange unless 
 you have sent the funds.

doNotSharePrivateKey2: It can be used to steal your current account.
doNotShareViewKey1: Only share with people you trust!

transactionBackground: Transaction will proceed in the background.
openedNewTab: The wallet opened a new tab to speed up the transaction. That tab will auto-close.
generatingTransactionWarning: If you leave this page before the transaction is generated, your transaction won't finish.

fileSettingsDescription: Directly add or remove files from your wallet.

doNotSharePhrase1: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone!
doNotSharePhrase2: It can be used to steal all your accounts.
feeNotRequired: There is currently no fee required.
proofGenerationTab: An open tab is required to efficiently generate transaction proofs

aleoFaucetStep1: Scan the QR code with your Phone
aleoFaucetStep1Description: And click on the prompt it shows you.
aleoFaucetStep3Description: Aleo Faucet will send you credits.
noNFTsSubMessage: You will see your NFT here once you have one.
noTransactionsRemaining: No remaining transactions, closing this tab
gpuSettingsDescription: Here you can turn GPU acceleration on or off to accelerate syncing and proof generation. This feature is not stable and may cause crashes.
ON_CHAIN_HISTORY: WARNING! This app is asking for your on-chain history. Make sure you really trust this app.
autoCloseSettingsDescription: Here you can configure auto close of the generating transaction page after the transaction is generated.
transactionDelegated: Transaction has been sent for proof generation.
fastTransactionDescription: The transaction will automatically be broadcasted and finalized.
delegateProofSettingsDescription: Here you can configure delegation of proof generation to a remote server. This will speed up proof generation but disclose the transaction details to a trusted server.
mainAssetBalanceIsZero: Your aleo credits (main asset) balance is zero. Aleo credits are required for the fee.
mustStakeAtLeastTenAleo: Initial stake must be at least 10 ALEO
unstakingProcess: Unstaking is a two-step process. After initiating unstaking, please ensure to claim your ALEO after the  3‚Äëhour processing period.
saveThese12Words: Save these 12 words to a password manager, or write down and store in a secure place. Do not share with anyone.
verifyMessagePrefix: Confirm you've saved your secret recovery phrase. Select word #10
onlyAleoSeedPhrasesAreSupported: Only Aleo Seed phrases are supported.
exploreTheWorldOfPrivateAssets: Explore the world of private assets
helpUsToImproveLeoWallet: Help us to improve Leo Wallet
createPasswordDescription: Set a password to unlock your wallet each time you use your computer. It can't be used to recover your wallet.
minimumCharsWithAtLeast: Minimum 8 characters with at least 1 number
backUpWalletInstructions: Save these 12 words to a password manager, or write down and store in a secure place. Do not share with anyone.
chainUnstable: Due to instability of Aleo Testnet3, transactions may fail.
transactionHistoryLost: We want to inform you that all transaction history has been lost due to a recent reset of the Aleo Testnet3.
resetRequiredDescription: Miden Testnet has upgraded to bech32 account IDs to improve your experience. To keep using your wallet, please restore from a backup file or seed phrase, or create a new one.
forgotPasswordDescription: If you've forgotten your password, you need to sign out and re-import your account. After that, you can create a new password.
forgotPasswordSecondDescription: Do not sign out unless you know your 12-word Seed phrase or have an encrypted backup file.
